title: Canvas API Wrapper
description:
BYU-Idaho had need of an API wrapper library to the Canvas LMS to enable other IT projects to save development time on connecting to the LMS.
This project alone has saved hundreds of hours and is always improving the experience of BYU-Idaho IT personnel, students, and professors.
Created in C# using Newtonsoft and Refit for easy response serialization/deserialization.

title: My Portfolio
description: A React.js + Chakra UI project to display my projects, bio, and a contact form powered by EmailJS.

title: Canvas Course Design Toolbox
description: A BYU-Idaho LTI to help teachers and course designers to create course content with templating tools that manage HTML, CSS, and JS through the Canvas WYSIWYG editor.

title: Pokemon Type Calculator - React Trial
description: A quick project to learn React and React Hooks. Helps you keep track of what moves to use in a Pokemon battle :)

title: Canvas Token Fetcher
description:
BYU-Idaho Hackathon Project Submission, Winter 2021. Allowed a developer to fetch a new API token from Canvas' admin login since students were not allowed Oauth. Powered by Electron, fetched by Puppeteer.
(React version currently under development)

title: D2L Gradebook CSV to Canvas Gradebook CSV
description:
A puppeteer project that transformed a gradebook CSV from one LMS (D2L) to another (Canvas) and then performed an automated upload. Migrated over 3,000 students' grades, saving the department hundreds of hours.
Work project for BYU-Idaho Student TechOps.

title: Student Software Engineering Training Projects
description:
Several training exercise projects that were developed to help new employees go from zero to proficient.
Trainings include:
  • Git training to help an employee understand Azure, Git, and Visual Studio.
  • Async and Synchronous training to help an employee understand multithreading and timing.
  • LINQ training to help an employee understand NuGet, CSVs, lambdas, and LINQ.
  • C# Style training to help an employee understand XML comments, style, and good C# practices.
  • Agile training to help an employee understand Kanban and Agile practices.
  • Testing training to help an employee understand xUnit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing.

title: Magic: The Gathering Card Search - BYUI WDD313 Project
description:
A small school project that would help someone search for Magic: The Gathering cards.
BYU-Idaho WDD313: Web Engineering II, Fall 2020. A web app using the mtgsdk API, ExpressJs, and Heroku.
